html:
FINALISTS ANNOUNCEMENT:

Before we announce our finalists, we want to take a moment to acknowledge all of the commenters who come here daily to share their expertise. Your efforts are of immense value to everyone who reads this site. We are happy to have a place for the community to honor your contributions, though only one of you will take home the prize.

Here are your finalists! Leave a comment below to make your vote. We’ll announce the winner on Thursday, January 16!

  • @ValiantJim—who does in fact own a Valiant—faithfully representing the Mopar contingent.
  • @SlowNRusty, with his voluminous knowledge of German automobiles.
  • @BaronVonZeppelin—despite taking a title of German nobility, the Pontiac is his area of expertise.

ORIGINAL POST:

In 2022 we created the Cognoscenti Award in honor of our late friend and expert commenter Ed_L, and it’s now in its third year. The Cognoscenti Award is distinct from the Most Valuable Commenter Award in that we’re asking for your help in identifying members of the BaT community whom you deem the most knowledgeable, scholarly, and/or erudite in their chosen vehicular subject.

Last year, this award was handed to Symbolic_International, aka Bill Noon—a font of valuable information about many significant cars, a good number of which he has driven at speed.

Here’s how it works:
To nominate, leave a comment below with a link to the profile of the user—and feel free to include examples of their commentary. Use the search function to find a particular user, or click on their username in any comments thread to open their profile page. Honorable mentions are welcome, but please be sure to cast an official vote for only one commenter. Previous winners are not eligible.

We’ll start tallying the votes on the morning of Monday, January 13 and the top three will move on to final voting. Nominations are open now!

Nominations for all other BaT Awards are also open! Be sure to vote for your favorites in the following categories:

  • Success Story of the Year
  • People’s Choice Listing of the Year
  • Most Valuable Commenter
  • Video of the Year
  • Photo Gallery of the Year

Check out our BaT Awards Announcement for the full schedule and rules.
